column4: if i just change my video cards is that ok, from an ati radeon 9200 to some genric 2-d sis card, is there anything else I need to do with ubuntu? hopefully it will just recognise it and work!
er ... I'm here with a card that keeps crashing the machine [-DevinE-]
oh well, I'll just give it a go, nothing ventured, nothing gained
the command to reconfigure the X server is 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg' -- might be needed if things break
